power.title: Arms of Hadar
power.fluff: You call upon Hadar, the Ebon Hunge, causing black tendrils to erupt from your body and batter nearby creatures, pushing them from you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: 1 + your Intelligence modifier squares.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You push the target half the distance.

power.title: Chains of Levistus
power.fluff: Spectral chains of ice leap from your hands and lash around your enemy, pulsing with cold each time the enemy moves

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each time the target willingly moves before the end of your next turn, it takes cold damage equal to 5 + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: If the target moves before the end of your next turn, you also gain a +2 power bonus to your first attack roll against it.

section.name: Sorcerer-King Pact:
section.text: If you spent your Fell Might and the target moves before the end of your next turn, your allies gain a +2 bonus to the first attack roll they make make against the target before the end of the encounter.

power.title: Clarion Call
power.fluff: You invoke Yuri the Hunter, and the sound of his bellowing horn blasts your enemies while invigorating you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3d4 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and the target is deafened until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Vestige Pact:
section.text: You gain temporary hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier for each target you hit. Temporary hit points gained in this way are cumulative with each other.

power.title: Cruel Bounty
power.fluff: You create a blazing sigil that flares with unwholesome light, scouring your foe and promising a blessing to any of your allies who bathe in its radiance

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls against the target.

section.name: Sorcerer-King Pact:
section.text: If you spent your Fell Might, the bonus increases to +2 and affects both attack rolls and damage rolls.

power.title: Cursebite
power.fluff: The shadowy auras of your curses grow teeth and star biting

section.name: Target:
section.target: each creature in the burst under your curse

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target takes ongoing necrotic damage equal to 5 + your charisma modifier (save ends). The ongoing damage also ends if the target is no longer under your curse.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: Each target takes a penalty on the saving throw equal to your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Dark Feast of Worms
power.fluff: You speak a single, forbidden word, summoning worms that burrow into your enemy's body

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus necrotic damage, and the target is feasted by worms (save ends).
While being feasted, the target is weakened and takes ongoing necrotic damage equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: The target is still feasted upon (save ends). The target is weakened, and the ongoing necrotic damage reduces by 5. The aftereffect keeps applying as long as the ongoing damage has not been reduced to 0 or less.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: The target takes a penalty on the first saving throw against this power. The penalty equals your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Diabolic Claw
power.fluff: You crook your hand into the shape of a claw, and a sulfurous talon of darkness rakes fiercely at your enemy, dragging it along

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: If the target is Large or smaller, you knock it prone.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target is Large or smaller, you slide it 2 squares.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: 1 + your Constitution modifier squares.

power.title: Dreadful Word
power.fluff: You whisper one word of a forbidden tongue to your foe, its mind reeling in terror

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to Will defense until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: The target also takes a penalty to all attack rolls against you equal to 1 + one-half your Constitution modifier (minimum -2 penalty).

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: The penalty equals your Intelligence modifier (minimum 2).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half the Will penalty.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: And half the attack roll penalty.

power.title: Flickering Venom
power.fluff: You deliver a dagger-shaped dose of magical energy that wounds and infects your unsuspecting foe

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier force and poison damage, or 3d6 + Charisma modifier force and poison damage if you have combat advantage.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: If you have combat advantage, the target also takes ongoing poison damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: If you have combat advantage, the target's eyes are blurred (save ends).
While its eyes are blurred, everything at least 3 squares away from the target has concealment against it.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus force damage if you have combat advantage.

power.title: Glow of Ulban
power.fluff: You call upon Ulban, whose blue-white light pierces the mind and interrupts the instinct for self preservation in those caught in its otherworldly glow

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: The target takes a penalty to the next saving throw it makes before the end of the encounter. The penalty equals your Intelligence modifier (minimum 1).

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target cannot take actions before the start of its next turn.

power.title: Grasp of Iron
power.fluff: A hand of iron appears around your foe and crushes it, popping bones and grinding flesh

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target cannot willingly move closer to you until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Elemental Pact:
section.text: The damage changes to match your current elemental affinity, and the power gains the corresponding keyword.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Your skin takes on an iron hue. Until the end of your next turn, you gain resist to all damage equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You take damage equal to your level, and can then make the Secondary Attack.

part.name: Secondary Attack

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.target: one creature within 5 squares of the primary target
section.text: Charisma +2 vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target cannot willingly move closer to you until the end of your next turn.

part.name: Elemental Pact:
part.text: The damage changes to match your current elemental affinity, and the power gains the corresponding keyword.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Your skin takes on an iron hue. Until the end of your next turn, you gain resist to all damage equal to 1 + one-half your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Hound of Dark Omen
power.fluff: Shadows and mist swirl around the target, coalescing into the form of a snarling hound that emits a dreadful howl before dissipating

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You slide the target 2 squares.

section.name: Gloom Pact Binder:
section.text: The target takes psychic damage equal to 2 + your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus if it doesn't move before the end of its next turn.

power.title: Life Bind
power.fluff: You call upon arcane power to wither your foe's flesh and cut its connection to life

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target takes a -2 penalty to saving throws.

section.name: Vestige Pact:
section.text: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot regain hit points and cannot gain temporary hit points.

power.title: Pandorum's Cry
power.fluff: From a distance too far to measure, you evoke an echo of Pandorum's birthing cry: a sound of madness incarnate

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: The target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Shadow Tentacles
power.fluff: Darkness flares to produce a sphere of writhing tentacles that grasp at your foes with an icy grip

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Charisma modifier cold damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: The power gains the Zone keyword. The burst creates a zone of difficult terrain that lasts until the end of your next turn. You are not affected by this difficult terrain.

power.title: Unseelie Sprites
power.fluff: You call forth a group of tiny, shadow-winged sprites that swarm around your enemies and lash out at them with poison-tipped spears

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma +2 vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Charisma modifier poison damage.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: Increase the damage by your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target takes a -2 penalty to the first saving throw it makes against poison before the end of the encounter.

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: Choose one ally in the wave. That ally's next Weapon attack before the end of the encounter gains the Poison keyword. If the attack hits, the target takes ongoing poison damage (save ends) equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Special:
section.text: The target and other creatures treats this as a Weapon attack instead of an Implement attack for all abilities.

power.title: Vampiric Embrace
power.fluff: A ribbon of twisting darkness streams from your hand to your target's heart, feeding on its vital force as you grow stronger

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude
+2 to the attack roll if the target is bloodied

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, or 2d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage if the target is bloodied.
You gain temporary hit points equal to one-half the damage that the target took.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target has less than 10 hit points, you kill it instantly.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target was not a minion and is now dead, this power gains the Healing keyword, and instead of gaining temporary hit points, you regain the same number of hit points.

power.title: Witchfire
power.fluff: From the mystic energy of the planes, you draw a brilliant white flame and set it in your enemy's mind and body, agony disrupting its very thoughts

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier fire damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and skill checks until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: The penalty equals 1 + your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Add your Constitution modifier to the damage roll.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and half the attack penalty.
